summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PWA shopping list app. Backend APIs working correctly with 15/16 tests passed. Frontend PWA functionality fully operational with successful login, item CRUD operations, category filtering, and mobile-optimized UI.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just different status code

passed_tests: User registration and login with JWT tokens
Shopping item creation with and without photos
Photo upload buttons (camera and file upload)
Real-time UI updates after API calls
